shell:shellcommand_object.shell:command: cat /etc/passwd | egrep -v '^(root|halt|sync|shutdown)' | awk -F: '($7 != "/usr/sbin/nologin" && $7 != "/bin/false") { print $1 " " $6 }' | while read user dir; do if [ ! -d "$dir" ]; then echo "The home directory ($dir) of user $user does not exist."; else owner=$(stat -L -c "%U" "$dir"); if [ "$owner" != "$user" ]; then echo "The home directory ($dir) of user $user is owned by $owner."; fi; fi; done
